title: Where's Weed
description: Senior frontend developer and team manager for a cannabis dispensary locator platform. Led the frontend team through a major codebase transition, introduced modern best practices, and helped scale the app’s UX. Managed frontend delivery for new features and contributed to high-traffic reliability.

title: Herbfluence
description: CTO and lead architect for a social media influencer marketing platform. Designed and built the full stack from scratch, managed all technical hires, and led a team to deliver an automated influencer campaign SaaS product. Responsible for DevOps, cloud deployments, and third-party integrations.

title: Peapod
description: Senior frontend developer (contract) for Peapod’s grocery delivery web app. Built out customer-facing features and helped modernize the UX for a large, established user base. Worked remotely as part of a distributed team.

title: Marathon Consulting
description: Senior web technology consultant focused on rebuilding legacy enterprise systems, including a major platform for Caterpillar Marine. Quickly adapted to unfamiliar tech stacks and delivered high-quality frontend architecture for business-critical use cases.

title: For Rent / Apartments.com
description: Software developer for apartment listing platforms used by millions. Architected and led the development of enterprise dashboards and server-side rendered web apps. Delivered new features for business and consumer audiences on large-scale, high-traffic sites.
